snippet: With Democrats paralyzed and Republicans offering wrong economic answers, there is no help on the way to millions of Americans after the daunting May jobs report.
abstract: Editorial laments daunting jobs report, which shows that only 69,000 jobs were created in May; warns that with Democrats paralyzed and Republicans offering wrong economic answers, there is no sign that help is on the way for the millions of unemployed Americans.
lead_paragraph: With Democrats paralyzed and Republicans offering wrong economic answers, there is no help on the way to millions of Americans after the daunting May jobs report.

headline.seo: How Slow Can the Economy Go?
